patterns.name: File Modification Anti-Pattern
patterns.description: Local models rewrite entire file instead of making incremental edits. When asked to modify an existing file, they output a completely new (often truncated) version instead of the requested changes.
patterns.mitigation_description: Size guard in execute-local-task.sh blocks writes when output is <50% of original file size. Edit strategy guard blocks incremental_edit tasks on large files.

patterns.name: Constraint Ignoring
patterns.description: Local models ignore explicit constraints in the task specification. Examples: 'pure markdown' produces JavaScript, 'NO dependencies' keeps require() statements.
patterns.mitigation_description: Add anti_patterns field to task schema. Strengthen constraint wording in prompts. Consider post-generation validation.

patterns.name: Explanation Instead of Code
patterns.description: Local models output explanatory text instead of code, ignoring the 'code only' system prompt instruction.
